lead_paragraph: In today's Patient Money column, Lesley Alderman writes about the lengths consumers will go to battle cold and flu symptoms.
snippet: There is still no cure for the common cold, but that hasn't stopped consumers from spending billions of dollars every year on vitamins, medicines and doctor visits, writes Lesley Alderman in today's Patient Money column.

headline.main: Smart Spending on Cold and Flu Remedies

abstract: There is still no cure for the common cold, but that hasn't stopped consumers from spending billions of dollars every year on vitamins, medicines and doctor visits, writes Lesley Alderman in today's Patient Money column.
